name: django-tortoise demo
description: integration of tortoise orm in django

AUTO_MIGRATE.description: Allows to run migrate on every deploy or a release.

CREATE_SUPER_USER.description: This will auto create a super user if no users are present. This won't work if auto migrations is off

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for a particular Django installation. This is used to provide cryptographic signing.

DEBUG.description: Leave DEBUG on for demo purposes. Set it to False to secure your app from the first start.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Domain names this is working under, first one will be used as a base for emails used in settings

EMAIL_URL.description: SMTP setting in the form of smtp+tls://user:password@example.com:587

UPGRADE_REQUIREMENTS.description: We need to workaround some heroku limitations and install example_project requirements

DISABLE_COLLECTSTATIC.description: Controls if Heroku should collect any static files. This won't work with example_project.

APP_COLLECTSTATIC.description: Make example project collect statics on it'sown.

DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE.description: Point to an settings module in example_project

SPARKPOST_API_KEY.description: Provide this key if you want to test SparkPost integration.
